content: @Michael Rothgang I think it would be better if Mathlib turns these on, rather than having them on by default for any downstream projects.
Oh, this is what is happening in https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/116290-rss/topic/Recent.20Commits.20to.20mathlib4.3Amaster/near/463379552. Sorry for the noise.
